name: MERACH Rowing Machines for Home, Powerful Electromagnetic Row Machine with 51.2" Extended Rail, 16-Level Handle Resistance Adjustment Rower, 350 LBS Load Capacity, Ergonomic Comfort Seat, Easy Storage

Smart Resistance Control: Adjust 16 resistance levels in real-time with handle buttons. No need to pause your workout—electronic control ensures precise and efficient training.

Extended Rail Design: The 51.2-inch rail is specially designed for taller users, allowing for a fuller range of motion. With a 350 lbs weight capacity, it provides stability and durability for all body types.
Enhanced Posture & LED Atmosphere: Improved rowing posture support reduces errors during exercise. The LED ambiance lights change color with resistance, adding energy and excitement to your workouts.

Smart Data Monitoring: The large screen monitor clearly displays workout data, providing real-time tracking of your progress. Connect via Bluetooth to the MERACH APP to easily record and analyze your performance.

Quick Setup, Space-Saving: 90% pre-assembled, set up in just 20 minutes for immediate use. Choose from folding rails or vertical storage options to save space and keep your home organized when not in use.

User-Friendly Design: The product measures 73.7 x 18.4 x 29.7 inches and weighs 43 lbs. It features an adjustable device holder for placing your smartphone or tablet on the monitor for optimal viewing. Additionally, the built-in water bottle holder allows for easy hydration during your workout, enhancing convenience.

Now enhanced with a 6.5% incline design, it simulates an uphill rowing experience, intensifying your training and accelerating fat burn.
